arabicText: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
All	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	all	
whatever	is	in	the	earth	proclaims	the	
Purity	of	Allah;	His	only	is	the	kingship	
and	His	only	is	all	praise;	and	He	is	Able	
to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	pāki	bolta	hai	jo	kuch	āasmānoñ	
meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuch	zameen	meiñ	usi	ka	
mulk	hai	aur	usi	ki	t’areef	aur	woh	har	
cheez	par	qādir	hai

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌۭ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	has	created	you,	so	among	
you	one	is	a	disbeliever	whereas	another	
is	a	Muslim;	and	Allah	is	seeing	your	
deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	tumheiñ	paida	kiya	to	tum	
meiñ	koi	kāfir	aur	tum	meiñ	koi	
Musalman	aur	Allah	tumhāre	kām	dekh	
raha	hai.

arabicText: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
He	created	the	heavens	and	the	earth	with	
the	truth,	and	fashioned	you	thereby	
making	you	in	best	shapes;	and	towards	
Him	only	is	the	return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usne	āasmān	aur	zameen	haq	ke	sāth	
banaye	aur	tumhāri	tasweer	ki	to	tumhāri	
achchhi	soorat	banāyi	aur	usi	ki	taraf	
phirna	hai.

arabicText: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
He	knows	all	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	
and	in	the	earth,	and	He	knows	all	what	
you	hide	and	all	what	you	disclose;	and	
Allah	knows	what	lies	within	the	hearts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jānta	hai	jo	kuch	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	
meiñ	hai	aur	jānta	hai	jo	tum	chhupāte	
aur	zāhir	karte	ho	aur	Allah	diloñ	ki	jānta	
hai.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ فَذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Did	not	the	news	of	those	who	disbelieved	
before	you	reach	you?	So	they	tasted	the	
evil	outcome	of	their	deeds,	and	for	them	
is	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tumheiñ	unki	khabar	na	āayi	jinhoñ	
ne	tum	se	pehle	kufr	kiya	aur	apne	kām	
ka	wabāl	chakha	aur	unke	liye	dard-nāk	
ážãb	hai.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُۥ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرٌۭ يَهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُوا۟ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ ۚ وَّٱسْتَغْنَى ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	their	Noble	Messengers	
used	to	bring	clear	proofs	to	them	-	in	
response	they	said,	“What!	Will	humans	
show	us	the	way?”;	they	therefore	became	
disbelievers	and	turned	away,	and	Allah	
acted	independently;	and	Allah	is	the	Independent,	the	Most	Praiseworthy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	unke	pās	unke	Rasool	
raushan	daleeleiñ	lāte	to	bole	kya	āadmi	
hameiñ	rāh	batayeñ	ge	to	kāfir	huwe	aur	
phir	gaye	aur	Allah	ne	be-niyāzi	ko	kām	
farmaya	aur	Allah	be-niyāz	hai	sab	
khoobiyoñ	sarāha.

arabicText: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن لَّن يُبْعَثُوا۟ ۚ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُبْعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
The	disbelievers	alleged	that	they	will	surely	not	be	raised	again;	proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	
Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“Surely	yes,	why	not?	By	oath	of	my	Lord,	you	
will	surely	be	raised	again	and	you	will	then	be	informed	of	your	misdeeds;	and	this	is	easy	for	
Allah.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kāfiroñ	ne	bakā	ke	woh	hargiz	na	uthāye	jāyeñ	ge	tum	farmāo	kyuñ	nahi	mere	Rab	ki	qasam	
tum	zaroor	uthāye	jāoge	phir	tumhāre	kotak	(a’amāl)	tumheiñ	jatā	diye	jāyeñ	ge	aur	yeh	Allah	
ko	āasān	hai.

arabicText: فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلْنَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	accept	faith	in	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger	and	the	light	which	We	have	sent	
down;	and	Allah	is	Well	Aware	of	what	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Imān	lāo	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	aur	us	Noor	par	jo	hum	ne	utāra	aur	Allah	tumhāre	kāmoñ	se	
khabar-dār	hai.

arabicText: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْجَمْعِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلتَّغَابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًۭا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
The	day	when	He	will	gather	you,	on	the	Day	of	Collective	Assembly	–	that	is	the	day	when	the	
loss	of	the	losers	will	be	laid	bare;	and	whoever	believes	in	Allah	and	does	good	deeds,	Allah	
will	relieve	him	of	his	sins	and	admit	him	into	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	flow,	for	them	to	
abide	in	it	forever;	this	is	the	greatest	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	tumheiñ	ikat-tha	karega	sab	jam'a	hoñe	ke	din	woh	din	hai	hār	wāloñ	ki	hār	khulne	ka	
aur	jo	Allah	par	imān	lāye	aur	achchha	kām	kare	Allah	uski	burāiyañ	utār	dega	aur	usey	bāghoñ	
meiñ	le	jāyega	jin	ke	neeche	nehreiñ	baheñ	ke	woh	hamesha	un	meiñ	raheiñ	yehi	badi	kāmyābi	
hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	disbelieved	and	denied	Our	
signs,	are	the	people	of	the	fire	–	to	remain	
in	it	forever;	and	what	a	wretched	outcome!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	aur	hamāri	āayateiñ	
jhutlayiñ	woh	āag	wāle	haiñ	hamesha	us	
meiñ	raheiñ	aur	kya	hi	bura	anjām.

arabicText: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
No	misfortune	befalls	except	by	Allah’s	
command;	and	Allah	will	guide	the	heart	of	
whoever	accepts	faith	in	Him;	and	Allah	
knows	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Koi	musibat	nahi	pahuñchti	magar	Allah	ke	
hukm	se	aur	jo	Allah	par	Imān	lāye	Allah	
uske	dil	ko	hidāyat	farma	dega	aur	Allah	sab	
kuchh	jānta	hai.

arabicText: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
englishTranslationText:
And	obey	Allah	and	obey	His	Noble	
Messenger;	then	if	you	turn	away,	know	that	
the	duty	upon	Our	Noble	Messenger	is	only	
to	plainly	convey.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ka	hukm	māno	aur	Rasool	ka	
hukm	māno	phir	agar	tum	mūñh	phero	to	
jān	lo	ke	Hamāre	Rasool	par	sirf	sareeh	
pahuñcha	dena	hai.

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	–	there	is	none	worthy	of	worship	
except	Him;	and	only	upon	Allah	must	the	
Muslims	rely.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	hai	jiske	siwa	kisi	ki	bandagi	nahi	aur	
Allah	hi	par	Imān	wāle	bharosa	kareiñ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدِكُمْ عَدُوًّۭا لَّكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا۟ وَتَصْفَحُوا۟ وَتَغْفِرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Some	of	your	wives	
and	children	are	your	enemies,	therefore	be	
wary	of	them;	and	if	you	pardon	and	
overlook	and	forgive,	then	indeed	Allah	is	
Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Tumhāri	kuch	bibiyañ	aur	
bachche	tumhāre	dushman	haiñ	to	un	se	
ehtiyāt	rakho	aur	agar	mu’āf	karo	aur	dar-	
guzar	karo	aur	bakhsh	do	to	beshak	Allah	bakhshne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Your	wealth	and	your	children	are	just	a	
test;	and	with	Allah	is	a	tremendous	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tumhāre	māl	aur	tumhāre	bachche	jāñch	hi	haiñ	aur	Allah	ke	pās	badā	sawāb	hai

arabicText: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ خَيْرًۭا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	fear	Allah	as	much	as	possible,	
and	heed	the	commands,	and	obey,	and	
spend	in	Allah’s	cause,	for	your	own	good;	
and	whoever	is	rescued	from	the	greed	of	
his	own	soul	–	is	they	who	will	be	successful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allah	se	daro	jahāñ	tak	ho	sake	aur	farmān	suno	aur	hukm	māno	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	
kharch	karo	apne	bhale	ko	aur	jo	apni	jān	ki	lālach	se	bachāya	gaya	to	wohi	falāh	pāne	wāle	
haiñ

arabicText: إِن تُقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا يُضَـٰعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
If	you	lend	an	excellent	loan	to	Allah,	He	will	double	it	for	you	and	forgive	you;	and	Allah	is	Most	
Appreciative,	Most	Forbearing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	tum	Allah	ko	achchha	qarz	doge	woh	tumhāre	liye	uske	doone	kar	dega	aur	tumheiñ	
bakhsh	dega	aur	Allah	qadr	farmāne	wāla	h’ilm	wāla	hai

arabicText: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText: The	All	Knowing	of	all	things	hidden	and	visible,	the	Most	Honourable,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText: Har	nihāñ	aur	‘ayāñ	ka	jānne	wāla	Ízzat	wāla	Hikmat	wāla.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَطَلِّقُوهُنَّ لِعِدَّتِهِنَّ وَأَحْصُوا۟ ٱلْعِدَّةَ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ ۖ لَا تُخْرِجُوهُنَّ مِنۢ بُيُوتِهِنَّ وَلَا يَخْرُجْنَ إِلَّآ أَن يَأْتِينَ بِفَـٰحِشَةٍۢ مُّبَيِّنَةٍۢ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُۥ ۚ لَا تَدْرِى لَعَلَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحْدِثُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ أَمْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad	–	peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him)!	When	you	people	
divorce	women,	divorce	them	at	the	time	
of	their	completing	the	appointed	period,	
and	keep	count	of	the	appointed	period;	
and	fear	Allah,	your	Lord;	do	not	expel	
them	from	their	houses	during	the	
appointed	period	nor	should	they	leave	
on	their	own,	unless	they	bring	about	
some	matter	of	blatant	lewdness;	and	
these	are	the	limits	of	Allah;	and	whoever	
crosses	Allah’s	limits	has	indeed	wronged	
himself;	do	you	not	know,	it	is	likely	that	
Allah	may	send	some	new	decree	after	
this?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Nabi	Jab	tum	log	aurtoñ	ko	talāq	do	
to	unki	'iddat	ke	waqt	par	unheiñ	talāq	do	
aur	‘iddat	ka	shumār	rakho	aur	apne	Rab	
Allah	se	daro	‘iddat	meiñ	unheiñ	unke	
gharoñ	se	na	nikālo	aur	na	woh	āap	
nikleiñ	magar	yeh	ke	koi	sareeh	be-hayāi	
ki	bāt	lāyeñ	aur	yeh	Allah	ki	hadeiñ	haiñ	
aur	jo	Allah	ki	hadoñ	se	āage	badhā	
beshak	usne	apni	jān	par	zulm	kiya	
tumheiñ	nahi	m’aloom	shayad	Allah	iske	
b’ad	koi	nayā	hukm	bheje.

arabicText: فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ فَارِقُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍۢ وَأَشْهِدُوا۟ ذَوَىْ عَدْلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَـٰدَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ يُوعَظُ بِهِۦ مَن كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	are	about	to	reach	their	
appointed	term,	hold	them	back	with	
kindness	or	separate	them	with	kindness,	
and	make	two	just	men	among	you	as	
witnesses,	and	establish	the	testimony	for	
Allah;	with	this	is	advised	whoever	
believes	in	Allah	and	the	Last	Day;	and	
whoever	fears	Allah	-	Allah	will	create	for	
him	a	way	of	deliverance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	jab	woh	apni	me’ād	tak	pahuñch	ne	ko	
hoñ	to	unheiñ	bhalāi	ke	sāth	rok	lo	ya	
bhalāi	ke	sāth	juda	kardo	aur	apne	meiñ	
do	siqah	ko	gawah	karlo	aur	Allah	ke	liye	
gawāhi	qāim	karo	is	se	nasihat	farmāyi	
jāti	hai	usey	jo	Allah	aur	pichle	din	par	
Imān	rakhta	ho	aur	jo	Allah	se	dare	Allah	
uske	liye	najāt	ki	rāh	nikāl	dega.

arabicText: وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَـٰلِغُ أَمْرِهِۦ ۚ قَدْ جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	will	provide	him	sustenance	from	a	
place	he	had	never	expected;	and	
whoever	relies	on	Allah	–	then	Allah	is	Sufficient	for	him;	indeed	Allah	will	accomplish	His	
command;	indeed	Allah	has	set	a	proper	measure	for	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usey	wahān	se	rozi	dega	jahāñ	uska	
gumān	na	ho	aur	jo	Allah	par	bharosa	
kare	to	woh	usey	kāfi	hai	beshak	Allah	
apna	kām	poora	karne	wāla	hai	beshak	
Allah	ne	har	cheez	ka	ek	andāza	rakha	
hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّـٰٓـِٔى يَئِسْنَ مِنَ ٱلْمَحِيضِ مِن نِّسَآئِكُمْ إِنِ ٱرْتَبْتُمْ فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلَـٰثَةُ أَشْهُرٍۢ وَٱلَّـٰٓـِٔى لَمْ يَحِضْنَ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰتُ ٱلْأَحْمَالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَن يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ يُسْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	for	those	of	your	women	who	have	no	hope	of	menstruation,	if	you	doubt,	the	appointed	
period	is	three	months	-	and	also	for	those	who	have	not	yet	had	menstruation;	and	the	
appointed	period	for	the	pregnant	women	is	up	to	the	time	they	deliver	their	burden;	and	
whoever	fears	Allah	–	Allah	will	create	ease	for	him	in	his	affairs.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tumhāri	aurtoñ	meiñ	jinheiñ	haiz	ki	
ummeed	na	rahi	agar	tumheiñ	kuchh	shak	ho	to	unki	‘iddat	teen	mahine	hai	aur	unki	jinheiñ	
abhi	haiz	na	āaya	aur	hamal	wāliyoñ	ki	me’ād	yeh	hai	ke	woh	apna	hamal	jan	leiñ	aur	jo	Allah	
se	dare	Allah	uske	kām	meiñ	āasāni	farma	dega.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُۥٓ إِلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُعْظِمْ لَهُۥٓ أَجْرًا
englishTranslationText:
This	is	Allah’s	command	that	He	has	sent	down	towards	you;	and	whoever	fears	Allah	–	Allah	
will	relieve	his	sins	and	bestow	upon	him	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	Allah	ka	hukm	hai	ke	usne	tumhāri	taraf	utāra	aur	jo	Allah	se	dare	Allah	uski	burāiyañ	utār	
dega	aur	usey	bada	sawāb	dega.

arabicText: أَسْكِنُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ سَكَنتُم مِّن وُجْدِكُمْ وَلَا تُضَآرُّوهُنَّ لِتُضَيِّقُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ ۚ وَإِن كُنَّ أُو۟لَـٰتِ حَمْلٍۢ فَأَنفِقُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ ۚ فَإِنْ أَرْضَعْنَ لَكُمْ فَـَٔاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ ۖ وَأْتَمِرُوا۟ بَيْنَكُم بِمَعْرُوفٍۢ ۖ وَإِن تَعَاسَرْتُمْ فَسَتُرْضِعُ لَهُۥٓ أُخْرَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
Accommodate	them	where	you	also	reside,	
according	to	your	means,	and	do	not	
harass	them	to	make	it	difficult	upon	them;	
and	if	they	are	pregnant,	give	them	the	
provision	till	they	deliver	their	burden;	
then	if	they	suckle	the	child	for	you,	pay	
them	its	due;	and	consult	with	each	other	
in	a	reasonable	manner;	and	if	you	create	
hardship	for	one	another,	the	child	will	get	
another	breast	feeding	nurse.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aurtoñ	ko	wahāñ	rakho	jahāñ	khud	rehte	
ho	apni	tāqat	bhar	aur	unheiñ	zarar	na	do	
ke	un	par	tangi	karo	aur	agar	hamal	
wāliyañ	hoñ	to	unheiñ	nān	nafqa	do	
yahāñ	tak	ke	unke	bachcha	paida	ho	phir	
agar	woh	tumhāre	liye	bachche	ko	doodh	
pilayeñ	to	unheiñ	iski	ujrat	do	aur	āapas	
meiñ	māqool	taur	par	mashwarā	karo	
phir	agar	bāham	muzāiqa	karo	(usey	
dushwār	samjho)	to	qareeb	hai	ke	usey	
aur	doodh	pilāne	wāli	mil	jāaye	gi.

arabicText: لِيُنفِقْ ذُو سَعَةٍۢ مِّن سَعَتِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقُهُۥ فَلْيُنفِقْ مِمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا مَآ ءَاتَىٰهَا ۚ سَيَجْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بَعْدَ عُسْرٍۢ يُسْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whoever	has	the	capacity	must	give	
provisions	according	to	his	means;	and	
the	one	whose	sustenance	is	restricted	
upon	him,	must	give	provisions	from	what	
Allah	has	given	him;	Allah	does	not	
burden	any	soul	except	according	to	what	
He	has	given	it;	Allah	will	soon,	after	the	
hardship,	create	ease.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maqdoor	wāla	apne	maqdoor	ke	qābil	
nafqa	de	aur	jis	par	uska	rizq	tang	kiya	
gaya	woh	us	meiñ	se	nafqa	de	jo	usey	
Allah	ne	diya	Allah	kisi	jān	par	bojh	nahi	
rakhta	magar	usi	qābil	jitna	usey	diya	hai	
qareeb	hai	ke	Allah	dushwāri	ke	b’ad	
āasāni	farma	dega.

arabicText: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ عَتَتْ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِۦ فَحَاسَبْنَـٰهَا حِسَابًۭا شَدِيدًۭا وَعَذَّبْنَـٰهَا عَذَابًۭا نُّكْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	many	a	town	existed	that	rebelled	
against	the	command	of	its	Lord	and	His	
Noble	Messengers,	so	We	took	a	severe	
account	from	it	-	and	struck	them	with	a	
dreadful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kitne	hi	shaher	they	jinhoñ	ne	apne	
Rab	ke	hukm	aur	uske	Rasooloñ	se	
sarkashi	ki	to	hum	ne	unse	sakht	hisāb	
liyā	aur	unheiñ	buri	mār	di.

arabicText: فَذَاقَتْ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهَا وَكَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ أَمْرِهَا خُسْرًا
englishTranslationText:
They	therefore	tasted	the	evil	outcome	of	
their	deeds,	and	the	outcome	of	their	
deeds	was	a	loss.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	unhoñ	ne	apne	kiye	ka	wabāl	chakha	
aur	unke	kām	ka	anjām	ghāta	huwa

arabicText: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًۭا ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَـٰٓأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ قَدْ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيْكُمْ ذِكْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	kept	prepared	a	severe	
punishment	for	them	–	therefore	fear	Allah,	
O	men	of	intellect!	O	People	who	Believe!	
Allah	has	sent	down	a	Remembrance	(or	an	
honour)	for	you.	(The	Holy	Prophet	is	a	
Remembrance	from	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	unke	liye	sakht	‘ažãb	tayyār	kar	
rakha	hai	to	Allah	se	daro	aey	‘aql	wālo	
Woh	jo	Imān	lāye	ho	beshak	Allah	ne	
tumhāre	liye	Ízzat	utāri	hai

arabicText: رَّسُولًۭا يَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ لِّيُخْرِجَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۚ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًۭا يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ قَدْ أَحْسَنَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ رِزْقًا
englishTranslationText:
The	Noble	Messenger	who	recites	the	clear	verses	of	Allah	to	you,	so	that	he	may	take	those	who	accept	
faith	and	do	good	deeds,	away	from	the	realms	of	darkness	towards	light;	and	whoever	accepts	faith	in	
Allah	and	does	good	deeds,	Allah	will	admit	him	into	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	flow,	to	abide	in	them	
for	ever	and	ever;	indeed	Allah	has	kept	an	excellent	sustenance	for	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	Rasool	ke	tum	par	Allah	ki	raushan	
Āayateiñ	padhta	hai	tāke	unheiñ	jo	Imān	
lāye	aur	achche	kām	kiye	andheriyoñ	se	
ujāle	ki	taraf	le	jāye	aur	jo	Allah	par	Imān	lāye	aur	achchha	kām	kare	woh	usey	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	
jāyega	jinke	neeche	nehreiñ	baheiñ	jin	meiñ	hamesha	hamesha	raheiñ	beshak	Allah	ne	uske	
liye	achchhi	rozi	rakhi

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍۢ وَمِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ مِثْلَهُنَّ يَتَنَزَّلُ ٱلْأَمْرُ بَيْنَهُنَّ لِتَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدْ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًۢا
englishTranslationText:
It	is	Allah	Who	has	created	the	seven	heavens,	and	seven	earthly	worlds	like	them;	the	command	descends	
within	them,	so	that	you	may	know	that	Allah	is	Able	to	do	all	things,	and	that	Allah’s	knowledge	
encompasses	everything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	hai	jisne	sāt	āasmān	banaye	aur	unhiñ	ke	barabar	zameeneiñ	hukm	inke	darmiyan	utarta	
hai	tāke	tum	jān	lo	ke	Allah	sab	kuch	kar	sakta	hai	aur	Allah	ka	‘ilm	har	cheez	ko	muheet	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَ ۖ تَبْتَغِى مَرْضَاتَ أَزْوَٰجِكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad	–	peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him)!	Why	do	you	forbid	
for	yourself	the	things	that	Allah	has	made	
lawful	for	you?	You	wish	to	please	some	of	
your	wives;	and	Allah	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	
Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	ghaib	batāne	wāle	Nabi	Tum	apne	upar	
kyuñ	harām	kiye	lete	ho	woh	cheez	jo	Allah	
ne	tumhāre	liye	halāl	ki	apni	bibiyoñ	ki	
marzi	chāhte	ho	aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	
maherbān	hai

arabicText: قَدْ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ تَحِلَّةَ أَيْمَـٰنِكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	ordained	expiation	for	your	
oaths;	and	Allah	is	your	Master;	and	Allah	
is	the	All	Knowing,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	Allah	ne	tumhāre	liye	tumhāri	
qasamoñ	ka	utār	muqarrar	farma	diya	aur	
Allah	tumhāra	Maula	hai	aur	Allah	‘ilm-o
hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِلَىٰ بَعْضِ أَزْوَٰجِهِۦ حَدِيثًۭا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتْ بِهِۦ وَأَظْهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَرَّفَ بَعْضَهُۥ وَأَعْرَضَ عَنۢ بَعْضٍۢ ۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتْ مَنْ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَـٰذَا ۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِىَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	the	Holy	Prophet	confided	a	
matter	to	one	of	his	wives;	so	when	she	
disclosed	it	and	Allah	conveyed	this	to	the	
Holy	Prophet,	he	told	her	part	of	it	and	held	
back	a	part;	so	when	the	Holy	Prophet	
informed	her	about	it,	she	said,	“Who	
informed	you?”;	he	said,	“The	All	Knowing,	
the	All	Aware	has	informed	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	Nabi	ne	apni	ek	bibi	se	ek	rāz	ki	bāt	
farmāyi	phir	jab	woh	uska	zikr	kar	baithi	
aur	Allah	ne	usey	Nabi	par	zāhir	kar	diya	to	
Nabi	ne	usey	kuchh	jatāya	aur	kuchh	se	
chashm	poshi	farmāyi	phir	jab	Nabi	ne	usey	
iski	khabar	di	boli	huzoor	ko	kisne	batāya	
farmaya	mujhe	‘ilm	wāle	khabar	dār	ne	
batāya.

arabicText: إِن تَتُوبَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ صَغَتْ قُلُوبُكُمَا ۖ وَإِن تَظَـٰهَرَا عَلَيْهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰهُ وَجِبْرِيلُ وَصَـٰلِحُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
If	you	both,	the	wives	of	the	Holy	Prophet,	
incline	towards	Allah,	for	indeed	your	
hearts	have	deviated	a	little;	and	if	you	
come	together	against	him	(the	Holy	
Prophet	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	
then	indeed	Allah	is	his	Supporter,	and	
Jibreel	and	the	virtuous	believers	are	also	
his	aides;	and	in	addition	the	angels	are	
also	his	aides.	(Allah	has	created	several	
supporters	for	the	believers.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Nabi	ki	donoñ	bibiyoñ!	Agar	Allah	ki	taraf	
tum	ruju’	karo	to	zaroor	tumhāre	dil	rāh	se	
kuch	hat	gaye	haiñ	aur	agar	un	par	zor	
bāñdho	to	beshak	Allah	unka	madad	gār	hai	
aur	Jibraeel	aur	nek	Imān	wāle	aur	iske	b’ad	
Firishte	madad	par	haiñ.

arabicText: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبْدِلَهُۥٓ أَزْوَٰجًا خَيْرًۭا مِّنكُنَّ مُسْلِمَـٰتٍۢ مُّؤْمِنَـٰتٍۢ قَـٰنِتَـٰتٍۢ تَـٰٓئِبَـٰتٍ عَـٰبِدَٰتٍۢ سَـٰٓئِحَـٰتٍۢ ثَيِّبَـٰتٍۢ وَأَبْكَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
It	is	likely	that,	if	he	divorces	you,	his	Lord	will	give	him	wives	better	than	you	in	your	place	
widows	and	maidens	who	are	obedient,	believing,	respectful,	penitent,	serving	and	fasting.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unka	Rab	qareeb	hai	agar	who	tumheiñ	
talāq	de	deiñ	ke	unheiñ	tum	se	behtar	
bibiyāñ	badal	de	itā’at	wāliyañ	Imān	
wāliyañ	adab	wāliyañ	tauba	wāliyañ	bandagi	wāliyañ	roza	dārein	biyahiyañ	aur	kuwāriyañ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَأَهْلِيكُمْ نَارًۭا وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلْحِجَارَةُ عَلَيْهَا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٌ غِلَاظٌۭ شِدَادٌۭ لَّا يَعْصُونَ ٱللَّهَ مَآ أَمَرَهُمْ وَيَفْعَلُونَ مَا يُؤْمَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Save	yourselves	and	your	families	from	the	fire,	the	fuel	of	which	is	men	
and	stones	–	appointed	over	it	are	the	extremely	strict	angels,	who	do	not	refuse	the	command	
of	Allah	and	carry	out	whatever	they	are	commanded.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Apni	jānoñ	aur	apne	ghar	wāloñ	ko	us	āag	se	bachāo	jiske	eeñdhan	āadmi	aur	
pat-thar	haiñis	par	sakht	karre	firishte	muqarrar	haiñ	jo	Allah	ka	hukm	nahi	tālte	aur	jo	unheiñ	
hukm	ho	wohi	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: “O	disbelievers!	Do	not	feign	excuses	this	day;	you	will	only	be	repaid	what	you	used	to	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	kāfiro	Āaj	bahāne	na	banāo	tumheiñ	wohi	badla	milega	jo	tum	karte	they.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوْبَةًۭ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمْ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَيُدْخِلَكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يَوْمَ لَا يُخْزِى ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ ۖ نُورُهُمْ يَسْعَىٰ بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغْفِرْ لَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Incline	towards	
Allah	in	a	repentance	that	becomes	a	
guidance	for	the	future;	it	is	likely	that	
your	Lord	will	relieve	you	of	your	sins	and	
admit	you	into	Gardens	beneath	which	
rivers	flow	-	on	the	day	when	Allah	will	
not	humble	the	Prophet	and	the	believers	
along	with	him;	their	light	will	be	running	
ahead	of	them	and	on	their	right;	they	will	
say,	“Our	Lord!	Perfect	our	light	for	us,	
and	forgive	us;	indeed	You	are	Able	to	do	
all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Allah	ki	taraf	aisi	tauba	
karo	jo	āage	ko	nasihat	ho	jāye	qareeb	hai	
ke	tumhāra	Rab	tumhāri	burāiyañ	tum	se	
utār	de	aur	tumheiñ	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	jāye	
jinke	neeche	nehreiñ	baheiñ	jis	din	Allah	
ruswa	na	karega	Nabi	aur	unke	sāth	ke	
imān	wāloñ	ko	unka	noor	daudta	hoga	
unke	āage	aur	unke	dehne	‘arz	kareñge	
aey	hamāre	Rab	Hamāre	liye	hamāra	
Noor	poora	karde	aur	hameiñ	bakhsh	de	
beshak	tujhe	har	cheez	par	qudrat	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوْبَةًۭ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمْ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَيُدْخِلَكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يَوْمَ لَا يُخْزِى ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ ۖ نُورُهُمْ يَسْعَىٰ بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغْفِرْ لَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Incline	towards	
Allah	in	a	repentance	that	becomes	a	
guidance	for	the	future;	it	is	likely	that	
your	Lord	will	relieve	you	of	your	sins	and	
admit	you	into	Gardens	beneath	which	
rivers	flow	-	on	the	day	when	Allah	will	
not	humble	the	Prophet	and	the	believers	
along	with	him;	their	light	will	be	running	
ahead	of	them	and	on	their	right;	they	will	
say,	“Our	Lord!	Perfect	our	light	for	us,	
and	forgive	us;	indeed	You	are	Able	to	do	
all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Allah	ki	taraf	aisi	tauba	
karo	jo	āage	ko	nasihat	ho	jāye	qareeb	hai	
ke	tumhāra	Rab	tumhāri	burāiyañ	tum	se	
utār	de	aur	tumheiñ	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	jāye	
jinke	neeche	nehreiñ	baheiñ	jis	din	Allah	
ruswa	na	karega	Nabi	aur	unke	sāth	ke	
imān	wāloñ	ko	unka	noor	daudta	hoga	
unke	āage	aur	unke	dehne	‘arz	kareñge	
aey	hamāre	Rab	Hamāre	liye	hamāra	
Noor	poora	karde	aur	hameiñ	bakhsh	de	
beshak	tujhe	har	cheez	par	qudrat	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ جَـٰهِدِ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad	–	peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	wage	holy	war	
against	the	disbelievers	and	the	
hypocrites,	and	be	strict	with	them;	and	
their	destination	is	hell;	and	what	a	
wretched	outcome!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	ghaib	batāne	wāle	Nabi	Kāfiroñ	par	
aur	munāfiqoñ	par	jihād	karo	aur	un	par	
sakhti	farmāo	aur	unka	thikāna	jahannam	
hai	aur	kya	hi	bura	anjām.

arabicText: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًۭا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱمْرَأَتَ نُوحٍۢ وَٱمْرَأَتَ لُوطٍۢ ۖ كَانَتَا تَحْتَ عَبْدَيْنِ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا صَـٰلِحَيْنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمْ يُغْنِيَا عَنْهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًۭٔا وَقِيلَ ٱدْخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّٰخِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	illustrates	the	example	of	the	
disbelievers	-	the	wife	of	Nooh	and	the	
wife	of	Lut;	they	were	bonded	in	marriage	
to	two	of	Our	bondmen	deserving	Our	
proximity	–	they	then	betrayed	them	so	
they	did	not	benefit	them	the	least	against	
Allah	and	it	was	declared,	“Both	of	you	
women	enter	the	fire,	along	with	others	
who	enter.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	kāfiroñ	ki	misāl	deta	hai	Nūh	ki	
aurat	aur	Lūt	ki	aurat	woh	hamāre	
bandoñ	meiñ	do	sazawār-e-qurb	
(muqarrab)	bandoñ	ke	nikah	meiñ	theiñ	
phir	unhoñ	ne	unse	dagha	ki	to	woh	Allah	
ke	sāmne	unheiñ	kuch	kām	na	āaye	aur	
farma	diya	gaya	ke	tum	dono	aurteiñ	
Jahannam	meiñ	jāo	jāne	wāloñ	ke	sāth.

arabicText: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًۭا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱمْرَأَتَ فِرْعَوْنَ إِذْ قَالَتْ رَبِّ ٱبْنِ لِى عِندَكَ بَيْتًۭا فِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِى مِن فِرْعَوْنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِى مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	Allah	illustrates	an	example	of	the	
Muslims	-	the	wife	of	Firaun;	when	she	prayed,	“My	Lord!	Build	a	house	for	me	near	You,	in	
Paradise,	and	deliver	me	from	Firaun	and	his	works,	and	rescue	me	from	the	unjust	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	Musalmanoñ	ki	misāl	bayān	
farmāta	hai	fir’aun	ki	bibi	jab	usne	‘arz	ki	aey	mere	Rab	Mere	liye	apne	pās	Jannat	meiñ	ghar	
banā	aur	mujhe	fir’aun	aur	iske	kām	se	najāt	de	aur	mujhe	zālim	logoñ	se	najāt	bakhsh

arabicText: وَمَرْيَمَ ٱبْنَتَ عِمْرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتْ بِكَلِمَـٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِتِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	example	of	Maryam	the	daughter	of	Imran,	who	guarded	her	chastity	-	We	therefore	
breathed	into	her	a	Spirit	from	Ourselves	–	and	she	testified	for	the	Words	of	her	Lord	and	His	
Books,	and	was	among	the	obedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Imrān	ki	beti	Maryam	jisne	apni	pārsayi	ki	hifazat	ki	to	hum	ne	us	meiñ	apni	taraf	ki	Rooh	
phooñki	aur	usne	apne	Rab	ki	bātoñ	aur	uski	kitāboñ	ki	tasdeeq	ki	aur	farmāñ bardāroñ meiñ	
huyi.
